name: Poly Vill
description:
Welcome to Poly vill.

You start as a planet with only water and trees. Grow your planet, fight natural disasters, and make your village come to life!

Although there will be challenges in the game, you can freely add as many rocks, trees, animals, and other wildlife you want without having to unlock them.

The difficulties of the game will be, for example, disease spreading, asteroids, and other things.

We are currently giving this as a prototype since this is the beginning of the game's development.  

If you find any bugs with the game, please let us know in the comments below.

Thanks for reading!
